summary: How do taxpayers know if they will get a tax refund or owe money? Employers must withhold federal income taxes on employee pay, and employees can claim allowances to exclude part of their pay from such withholding. IRS publishes withholding tables so employers know how much to withhold. Recent tax law changes gave Treasury discretion to set the value of the withholding allowance for 2018...
title: Federal Tax Withholding: Treasury and IRS Should Document the Roles and Responsibilities for Updating Annual Withholding Tables
